learning.supervised.test

Class ModelPersistenceTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • learning.supervised.test.ModelPersistenceTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    junit.framework.Test

    public class ModelPersistenceTest
extends junit.framework.TestCase
    This class implements the methods that test whether saving and loading classifier models works for all the implemented classifiers.
